versions.versionNotes: Initial version - Adds SEO elements and optimization suggestions

schema.prompt:
Optimize content for search engine optimization (SEO):

Content Text: {{input.contentText}}
Target Keywords: {{input.targetKeywords}}
Competitor Analysis: {{input.competitorAnalysis}}
SEO Goals: {{input.seoGoals}}

Provide comprehensive SEO optimization:

1. Keyword Optimization:
   - Primary keyword placement
   - Secondary keyword integration
   - Long-tail keyword opportunities
   - Semantic keyword variations
   - Keyword density analysis

2. On-Page SEO Elements:
   - Title tag optimization
   - Meta description creation
   - Header structure (H1, H2, H3)
   - URL slug suggestions
   - Image alt text recommendations

3. Content Structure:
   - Featured snippet optimization
   - FAQ section suggestions
   - Table of contents
   - Internal linking strategy
   - External linking opportunities

4. Technical SEO:
   - Content length optimization
   - Readability improvements
   - Mobile-friendly considerations
   - Page speed factors
   - Schema markup suggestions

5. User Experience (UX):
   - Content hierarchy
   - Scannable formatting
   - Call-to-action placement
   - Engagement signals
   - Bounce rate optimization

6. Content Quality:
   - E-A-T (Expertise, Authority, Trust)
   - Original insights and value
   - Comprehensive topic coverage
   - Fresh and updated information
   - Authoritative sources

7. Search Intent Matching:
   - Informational intent optimization
   - Transactional intent elements
   - Navigational intent support
   - Commercial intent signals
   - User journey alignment

8. Performance Metrics:
   - Target SERP features
   - Click-through rate optimization
   - Conversion rate elements
   - Engagement metrics
   - Ranking potential assessment

Return as structured JSON with keys: optimizedContent, seoElements (object), keywordStrategy (object), technicalSEO (object), performanceMetrics (object), improvementSuggestions (array), competitiveAdvantage (array).

props.placeholder: Enter the content to optimize for SEO...
Primary and secondary keywords to target...
What are competitors doing well? Top-ranking content insights...
Ranking objectives, traffic goals, conversion targets...

translations.description: Optimizes content for search engines with keyword integration and technical SEO elements
translations.instructions: Enter your content and target keywords. The system will optimize for SEO while maintaining readability and user experience.
translations.name: SEO Optimizer
